title: Ward Village Shops
seo_description: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx that carry brand name designers for a whole lot less!
contents_1: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx that carry brand name designers for a whole lot less!
description: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx that carry brand name designers for a whole lot less! Ward Center also houses Marukai Market Place with a large selection of groceries, Japanese products, gifts, and prepared food.
